definition: the top edge of a vessel or other container, roll around the rim of
details:
noun
- the top edge of a vessel or other container
= synonyms: lip
- a projection used for strength or for attaching to another object
= synonyms: flange
- the outer part of a wheel to which the tire is attached
- (basketball) the hoop from which the net is suspended
= example: (basketball) the hoop from which the net is suspended
- the shape of a raised edge of a more or less circular object
verb
- roll around the rim of
= example: roll around the rim of
- furnish with a rim
= example: furnish with a rim
- run around the rim of
= example: run around the rim of
